config.sql2: SELECT D.SCODE GSBM, D.SNAME GSMC, D.SPCODE AS PID, SUM(NVL(DYSJ, 0)) DYSJ, SUM(NVL(SNTQ, 0)) SNTQ, SUM(NVL(TBZJE, 0)) TBZJE, SUM(NVL(TBZJL, 0)) TBZJL, SUM(NVL(LJSJ, 0)) LJSJ, SUM(NVL(SNTQ_1, 0)) SNTQ_1, SUM(NVL(TBZJE, 0)) TBZJE_1, SUM(NVL(TBZJL, 0)) TBZJL_1, SUM(NVL(BNYS, 0)) BNYS, SUM(NVL(CYE, 0)) CYE, SUM(NVL(WCL, 0)) WCL FROM(SELECT GSBM, DYSJ, NVL(SNTQ, 0) SNTQ, (DYSJ-NVL(SNTQ, 0)) TBZJE, (CASE WHEN (NVL(SNTQ, 0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE (DYSJ-SNTQ)/SNTQ END) TBZJL, 0 LJSJ, 0 SNTQ_1,0 TBZJE_1, 0 TBZJL_1, 0 BNYS, 0 CYE, 0 WCL FROM (SELECT A.DIM_COMPANY AS GSBM, A.FACT_A AS DYSJ, (SELECT FACT_A FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD B WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD=':itemperiod' AND DIM_PERIOD=':comparePeriod' AND A.DIM_COMPANY=B.DIM_COMPANY) AS SNTQ FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD A WHERE A.DIM_ITEMPERIOD=':itemperiod' AND A.DIM_PERIOD=:period) UNION ALL SELECT GSBM, 0 DYSJ, 0 SNTQ, 0 TBZJE, 0TBZJL, LJSJ, NVL(SNTQ, 0) SNTQ_1, (LJSJ-NVL(SNTQ, 0)) TBZJE_1, (CASE WHEN (NVL(SNTQ, 0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE (LJSJ-SNTQ)/SNTQ END) TBZJL_1, 0 BNYS, 0 CYE, 0 WCL FROM (SELECT A.DIM_COMPANY AS GSBM, A.FACT_B AS LJSJ, (SELECT FACT_B FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD B WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD=':itemperiod' AND DIM_PERIOD=':comparePeriod'AND A.DIM_COMPANY=B.DIM_COMPANY ) AS SNTQ FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD A WHERE A.DIM_ITEMPERIOD=':itemperiod' AND A.DIM_PERIOD=:period ) UNION ALL SELECT DIM_COMPANY GSBM, 0 DYSJ, 0 SNTQ, 0 TBZJE, 0TBZJL, 0 LJSJ, 0 SNTQ_1, 0 TBZJE_1, 0 TBZJL_1, FACT_C BNYS, FACT_D-FACT_C CYE, (CASE WHEN FACT_C=0 THEN 0 ELSE FACT_D/FACT_C END) WCL FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD=':itemperiod' AND DIM_PERIOD=:period ) H RIGHT JOIN (SELECT SCODE, SPCODE, SNAME FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE CISDEL='N' AND CTYPE<>'R' START WITH SCODE=:company CONNECT BY PRIOR SCODE = SPCODE) D ON D.SCODE = H.GSBM GROUP BY D.SCODE, D.SNAME,D.SPCODE ORDER BY D.SCODE
